title: Himi 304
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ke tau hiva fakataha,
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
‘I he loto fiefia,
‘I he’ene ‘ofa.
2.
Pea ke tau angimui,
Ki he kau ‘āngelo,
‘O fai ki he’ene fekau,
‘I he loto lelei.
3.
Ke tau fa’a fakafeta’i,
‘I he’ene ‘ofa,
Ki he kakai ‘i lalo ni,
‘Oku angahia.
4.
’Eiki ke ke fakafo’ou
Ho’o ngāue lelei,
Ke tupu ai,’emau ‘ofa,
Pea mo e tui.
5.
‘Eiki, ke tau feangainga,
Moe ‘Afiona,
‘I he maama, ‘i lalo ni,
Pea ‘i ‘olunga. *
